title: Software Engineer Resume – Google Example
description: A clean, ATS-optimized resume format used by software engineers at top tech companies. Highlights problem-solving skills, measurable impact, and concise project summaries.

title: Data Analyst Resume – AnalytixMinds Solutions Example
description: Data-driven resume layout emphasizing analytical skills, SQL/Python experience, and visualization tools like Power BI and Tableau.

title: Financial Analyst Resume – Goldman Sachs Example
description: A professional resume layout ideal for finance and investment roles. Focuses on quantitative analysis, reporting accuracy, and Excel modeling skills.

title: Accountant Resume – Deloitte Example
description: Well-structured accounting resume emphasizing detail orientation, auditing, and compliance with IFRS and GAAP standards.

title: Registered Nurse Resume – Clinic Nurse Example
description: Example of a clear, patient-centered resume that balances technical medical expertise with compassionate communication and teamwork.

title:
Medical Assistant Resume – George Washington University Hospital
 Example
description: A professional healthcare resume template tailored for clinical support staff, emphasizing certifications, care coordination, and EHR systems.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst Resume – SOC / Blue Team Example
description: Resume style focused on security monitoring, incident response, SIEM tooling and certifications (Security+, CEH). Vhodné pre junior SOC analyst / cyber defense pozície.

title: Product Manager Resume – Big Tech Style
description: Ukážky PM resumé, ktoré pomohli kandidátom získať role v produktových tímoch vo veľkých tech firmách. Dôraz na dopad, metriky (engagement, growth %) a spoluprácu s engineeringom.

title: Investment Banking Analyst Resume – JP Morgan Track
description: Formát používaný na entry-level analyst a summer analyst pozície v investičných bankách. Zdôrazňuje modelovanie, valuácie, M&A podporu a prácu s klientmi.
